channel.title: [PI]- One Reward
channel.description: Okay guys, I have a quest that when you complete it you can just keep clicking the NPC for the reward over and over and over again.. I want this to be fixed... I would prefer that when you complete the quest the NPC disapears or teleports away... But if not, How would I make it to where I only get one Reward for the quest?

item.title: [PI]- One Reward
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:459992”]Yea, stop making threads over and over again. Stay on one thread! Jeez.[/quote]Sorry, but I am impatient right now, a little on edge… This is all I need to know how to do before I can move on, and I would REALLY LIKE IT IF SOMEBODY COULD ACTUALLY “GIVE ME A FULL GUIDE” or “VIEW ME ON TeamViewer” <-- I learn by watching. 'Cause in my mind I can just refer back to what I saw, and do it over again.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]- One Reward
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Okay guys, I have a quest that when you complete it you can just keep clicking the NPC for the reward over and over and over again…
I want this to be fixed… I would prefer that when you complete the quest the NPC disapears or teleports away… But if not,
How would I make it to where I only get one Reward for the quest?
